That superb effort helped overcome a herculean performance from the Jazz ' Donovan Mitchell , who went for a season - high 46 points . Derrick Favors went 10 - for - 12 from the field for 23 points , while adding 18 rebounds , 3 steals and 3 blocked shots in 28 minutes . Forward Khris Middleton also made a significant contribution to Milwaukee 's offense , scoring 29 points while dishing out 6 assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo scored a whopping 43 points on 15 - of - 26 shooting and pulled down 14 rebounds . Brook Lopez was very efficient in Brook Lopez time on the floor , scoring 16 points ( 8 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 7 FT ) and grabbing 8 rebounds . Next , the Bucks will head to Phoenix to face Suns on Monday . The Jazz will stay home to host Pelicans on Monday .

D'Angelo Russell went on to lead all scorers in the contest with 29 points , in addition to 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals on 13 - of - 22 shooting . Spencer Dinwiddie had a strong game for Brooklyn , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 8 assists and 2 rebounds , in 30 minutes . Kawhi Leonard struggled to just 4 points on 1 - of - 7 shooting during Monday 's game against the Timberwolves , so it was good to see Kawhi Leonard return to form and have a ton of success on the offensive side of the ball . Pascal Siakam got a rare start for Markieff Morris ( sinus infection ) and provided 16 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . It was n't a 2 - man show , however , as Jonas Valančiūnas came off the bench to notch a double - double of 24 points and 8 rebounds in just 26 minutes . The Nets now head to New York for a Saturday night showdown versus the Knicks  while the Raptors will look to bounce back when they take on Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday .

Guerschon Yabusele recorded 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 0 3Pt ) and 5 rebounds in 25 minutes . In 26 minutes , Terry Rozier finished with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and 4 rebounds .
